about_the_game:
Welcome to HopeTown — a grim underground world where remnants of human civilization fight for survival among the ruins of an ancient prison.

You will:

Explore the Ruins of the Old Prison: Delve into dark corridors and abandoned cells where every corner hides its own secrets and dangers. Discover places where dramatic events once unfolded.

Fight Dangerous Enemies: Overcome confrontations with various threats that remain in the prison after the rebellion. Use your skills and available weapons to survive in this perilous place.

Solve Mysteries and Find Hidden Elements: Collect useful items, explore deserted corners, and uncover secrets that will aid you in your journey.

Key Features:

Immersive Combat System: Experience thrilling battles using a variety of weapons and unique mechanisms created by the Order of Mechanics.

Deep Atmosphere: Interact with the environment, discover hidden elements, and use them to your advantage.

Rich Lore: Immerse yourself in the history of the Old Prison and the events that led to its destruction. Explore a world filled with history and details that make it vivid and realistic.

Crafting and Items: Resource gathering and item creation are crucial parts of the gameplay, allowing you to enhance your capabilities and adapt to challenging conditions.

Discover the world of Hope Town and its dark history, immersing yourself in the atmosphere and setting of the game. Become part of this captivating journey and uncover what lies in the shadows of the abandoned prison.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4340 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon HD 7850 with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 with 6 GB VRAM or AMD Radeon RX 5600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
